properties.body:
YUCATAN CHANNEL.
1. VESSEL, WHITE HULL WITH RED STRIPE,
   20 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
   IN 21-29N 084-44W. VESSELS IN VICINITY
   REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
   U.S. COAST GUARD MIAMI, PHONE: 305 415 6800.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 411/10(51), 405/10 REFERS.
